00048 #define LLP_GROUP_GENERATOR     2
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * Prime number used in Diffie & Hellman modular exponentiation caculations.
00052  * It is the 2048 bit MODP group (id 14), specified in RFC 3526.
00053  */
00054 static u_char prime[] = {
00055                 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, 0x01, /* Size of number. */
00056                 0x00,                                   /* Signal byte. */
00057                 0xFF, 0xFF, 0XFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF,
00058                 0xC9, 0xFD, 0xDA, 0xA2, 0x21, 0x68, 0xC2, 0x34,
00059                 0xC4, 0xC6, 0x62, 0x88, 0x80, 0xDC, 0x1C, 0xD1,
00060                 0x29, 0x02, 0x4E, 0x08, 0x8A, 0x67, 0xCC, 0x74,
00061                 0x02, 0x0B, 0xBE, 0xA6, 0x3B, 0x13, 0x9B, 0x22,
00062                 0x51, 0x4A, 0x08, 0x79, 0x8E, 0x34, 0x04, 0xDD,
00063                 0xEF, 0x95, 0x19, 0xB3, 0xCD, 0x3A, 0x43, 0x1B,
00064                 0x30, 0x2B, 0x0A, 0x6D, 0xF2, 0x5F, 0x14, 0x37,
00065                 0x4F, 0xE1, 0x35, 0x6D, 0x6D, 0x51, 0xC2, 0x45,
00066                 0xE4, 0x85, 0xB5, 0x76, 0x62, 0x5E, 0x7E, 0xC6,
00067                 0xF4, 0x4C, 0x42, 0xE9, 0xA6, 0x37, 0xED, 0x68,
00068                 0x0B, 0xFF, 0x5C, 0xB6, 0xF4, 0x06, 0xB7, 0xED,
00069                 0xEE, 0x38, 0x6B, 0xFB, 0x5A, 0xB9, 0x9F, 0xA5,
00070                 0xAE, 0x9F, 0x24, 0x11, 0x7C, 0x4B, 0x1F, 0xE6,
00071                 0x49, 0x28, 0x66, 0x51, 0xEC, 0xE4, 0x5B, 0x3D,
00072                 0xC2, 0x00, 0x7C, 0xB8, 0xA1, 0x63, 0xBF, 0x05,
00073                 0x98, 0xDA, 0x48, 0x36, 0x1C, 0x55, 0xD3, 0x9A,

00091 /*============================================================================*/
00092 /* Private functions prototypes.                                              */
00093 /*============================================================================*/
00094 
00095 /*
00096  * Computes (y = g^x mod p), with values for g and p fixed.
00097  */
00098 static int compute_y(mpint y, mpint x);
00099 
00100 /*============================================================================*/
00101 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00102 /*============================================================================*/           
00103 
00104 int llp_compute_dh_params(mpint x, mpint y) {
00105 
00106         /* Exponent x is a string of pseudo-random bytes. */
00107         if (util_rand_mpint(x, LLP_X_LENGTH - MPINT_SIZE_LENGTH -
00108                         MPINT_SIGNAL_LENGTH) == UTIL_ERROR) {
00109                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error generating random exponent.");
00110                 return LLP_ERROR;
00111         };
00112         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "random exponent generated.");
00113 
00114         /* Computing (y = g^x mod p)    for Diffie & Hellman. */
00115         if (compute_y(y, x) == LLP_ERROR) {
00116                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error computing y parameter.");
00117                 return LLP_ERROR;
00118         }
00119         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "y parameter computed.");
00120 
00121         return LLP_OK;
00122 }
00123 /******************************************************************************/
00124 int llp_compute_dh_secret(mpint z, mpint y, mpint x) {
00125         BIGNUM *z_bignum, *y_bignum, *x_bignum, *p_bignum;
00126         BN_CTX *context = NULL;
00127         int length;
00128         int return_value;
00129         
00130         return_value = LLP_OK;
00131         z_bignum = BN_new();
00132         y_bignum = BN_mpi2bn(y, MPINT_LENGTH(y) + MPINT_SIZE_LENGTH, NULL);
00133         x_bignum = BN_mpi2bn(x, MPINT_LENGTH(x) + MPINT_SIZE_LENGTH, NULL);
00134         
00135         p_bignum = BN_mpi2bn(prime, MPINT_LENGTH(prime) + MPINT_SIZE_LENGTH, NULL);
00136         
00137         if (z_bignum == NULL || y_bignum == NULL || x_bignum == NULL ||
00138                         p_bignum == NULL) {
00139                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error allocating BIGNUMs.");
00140                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00141                 goto return_label;
00142         }
00143         
00144         /* Creating the context. */
00145         context = BN_CTX_new();
00146         BN_CTX_init(context);
00147 
00148         /* Computing y_in^x mod p. */
00149         BN_mod_exp(z_bignum, y_bignum, x_bignum, p_bignum, context);
00150         length = BN_bn2mpi(z_bignum, NULL);
00151         if (length > LLP_Z_LENGTH) {
00152                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "computed z is too large.");
00153                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00154                 goto return_label;
00155         }
00156 
00157         /* Converting bignum z to mpint z. */
00158         BN_bn2mpi(z_bignum, z);
00159 
00160 return_label:
00161 
00162         BN_free(z_bignum);
00163         BN_free(y_bignum);
00164         BN_free(x_bignum);
00165         BN_free(p_bignum);
00166         BN_CTX_free(context);   
00167         return return_value;
00168 }
00169 /*============================================================================*/
00170 /* Private functions implementations.                                         */
00171 /*============================================================================*/           
00172 
00173 int compute_y(mpint y, mpint x) {
00174         /* Bignum representations. */
00175         BIGNUM  *y_bignum, *g_bignum, *x_bignum, *p_bignum;
00176         BN_CTX *context = NULL;
00177         int length;
00178         int return_value;
00179         
00180         return_value = LLP_OK;
00181         y_bignum = BN_new();
00182         g_bignum = BN_new();
00183         x_bignum = BN_mpi2bn(x, MPINT_LENGTH(x) + MPINT_SIZE_LENGTH, NULL);
00184         p_bignum = BN_mpi2bn(prime, MPINT_LENGTH(prime) + MPINT_SIZE_LENGTH, NULL);
00185 
00186         if (y_bignum == NULL || g_bignum == NULL || x_bignum == NULL ||
00187                         p_bignum == NULL) {
00188                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error allocating BIGNUMs.");
00189                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00190                 goto return_label;
00191         }
00192 
00193         BN_set_word(g_bignum, LLP_GROUP_GENERATOR);
00194 
00195         /* Creating the context. */
00196         context = BN_CTX_new();
00197         BN_CTX_init(context);
00198                 
00199         /* Computing (g^x mod p). */
00200         BN_mod_exp(y_bignum, g_bignum, x_bignum, p_bignum, context);
00201 
00202         length = BN_bn2mpi(y_bignum, NULL);
00203         if (length > LLP_Y_LENGTH) {
00204                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "computed y is too large.");
00205                 return_value = LLP_ERROR;
00206                 goto return_label;
00207         }
00208 
00209         /* Cnverting bignum y_out to mpint y_out. */
00210         BN_bn2mpi(y_bignum, y);
00211 
00212 return_label:
00213 
00214         BN_free(y_bignum);
00215         BN_free(g_bignum);
00216         BN_free(x_bignum);
00217         BN_free(p_bignum);
00218         BN_CTX_free(context);   
00219         return LLP_OK;
00220 }
00221 /******************************************************************************/
